articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets King of Spain
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets King of Spain
 Pyongyang, October 12 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Sunday sent a message of greeting to Felipe VI, king of Spain, on the occasion of its national day.
					 The message extended warm congratulations to the king and sincerely wished the friendly Spanish people greater progress and prosperity.

articles.title: S. Korea Warned against Reckless Acts to Chill Atmosphere of Improving Relations
articles.content:
S. Korea Warned against Reckless Acts to Chill Atmosphere of Improving Relations
 Pyongyang, October 12 (KCNA) -- The spokesman for the north side delegation to the north-south high-level contact released a statement on Sunday in connection with the fact that an anti-DPRK leaflet-scattering operation was conducted in south Korea at a time when the second round of the north-south high-level contact is high on the agenda in the wake of the contact made between the high-ranking officials from the north and the south in Inchon on October 4.
					 The south Korean authorities have hurled dirty human scum into another leaflet-scattering operation defaming the dignity and social system of the DPRK since Friday.
					
					 To cope with the on-going situation, frontline units of the Korean People's Army launched actions to frustrate the operation.
					
					 Far from drawing a due lesson from the leaflet-scattering operation foiled by the KPA units' operation to shoot down balloons and deeply reflecting on it, the south Korean authorities groundlessly let the south side chief delegate to the north-south general-level military talks dare trumpet that the KPA side perpetrated such a provocation as showering bullets for no reason and this was a blatant violation of the UN charter, the armistice agreement and north-south basic agreement.
					
					 This is, indeed, nothing but a height of impudence, the statement said, adding:
					
					  Even the chief executive of south Korea pulled up again the DPRK over its nuclear issue and took the lead in the smear campaign, uttering that "the north is taking double attitude of provocation and appeasement." And Ryu Kil Jae, minister of Unification, who should be more responsible for the improvement of the inter-Korean relations than anyone else, was so ridiculous as to bluster that south Korea could not give up its "principle" while having dialogue and the north should show its "sincerity", to begin with. 
					
					 The statement termed this a disgusting behavior of the south Korean authorities.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 Their persistent sinister behavior and coarse invectives would only prove that their talk about "regular dialogue" and assertion about "proposal for unification" are nothing but a cunning artifice of the chief executive to improve her image and safely spend the remaining tenure of her office.
					
					 The south Korean authorities should clarify, though belatedly, before all Koreans their true intention whether to mend the north-south relations with their sleeves rolled up after breaking with the inglorious past or to while away time, alluring and deceiving the nation.
					
					 The south Korean authorities should stop the reckless acts of chilling the hard-won atmosphere of improving the inter-Korean relations, properly understanding the sincere efforts of the DPRK to make a new history of improving the inter-Korean relations. 
					
					 As long as such grave provocation as leaflet-scattering goes on, the retaliatory action of the army and people of the DPRK to cope with it will develop into more deadly physical strikes. 
					
					 There is still a chance of choice. 
					
					 The south Korean authorities should not forget even a moment that all Koreans are sharply watching their moves.

articles.title: Greetings from Indonesian Party Leaders
articles.content:
Greetings from Indonesian Party Leaders
 Pyongyang, October 12 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), received a message of greeting from General Chairwoman Megawati Soekarnoputri and Secretary General  Tjahjo Kumolo of the Central Directive Council of the Indonesian Democratic Party of Struggle on October 6. 
					 The message said that all the members of the Central Directive Council of the Indonesian Democratic Party of Struggle extended congratulations to Kim Jong Un on the occasion of the 69th founding anniversary of the WPK on October 10, 2014.
					
					 We believe that the Korean people will achieve prosperity and build a thriving nation under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un and the Workers' Party of Korea, the message noted. 
					
					 Availing ourselves of this opportunity, we hope that the friendly and cooperative relations between the Indonesian Democratic Party of Struggle and the Workers' Party of Korea will grow stronger, it said.

articles.title: Egyptian Guest Arrives
articles.content:
Egyptian Guest Arrives
 Pyongyang, October 12 (KCNA) -- Naguib Sawiris, executive chairman of the Orascom Telecom Media and Technology Holdings SAE of Egypt, arrived here Sunday.

articles.title: Ri Se Gwang Bags Gold Medal in World Gymnastics Championship
articles.content:
Ri Se Gwang Bags Gold Medal in World Gymnastics Championship
 Pyongyang, October 12 (KCNA) -- DPRK player Ri Se Gwang bagged a gold medal in men's vault in the 45th Artistic Gymnastics World Championships.
					 He gave full display to high techniques. He got 15. 416 points and defeated the Ukrainian and U.S. players to hold the championship.

articles.title: Day of Physical Culture in DPRK
articles.content:
Day of Physical Culture in DPRK
 Pyongyang, October 12 (KCNA) -- October 12 this year is Day of Physical Culture in the DPRK.
					 On this occasion, the Korean people recall with deep emotion the feats President Kim Il Sung performed for the nation's sports development.
					
					 On August 2, Juche 38 (1949), Kim Il Sung called a DPRK Cabinet meeting to institute a day of physical culture, saying that second Sunday of every October would be appropriate for it. He stressed that all units should organize more brisk mass sports activities with the day as an occasion and ranks of sportspersons be increased and more excellent players trained through such activities.
					
					 On October 30 that year, the President attended the national sports games marking Day of Physical Culture to encourage its participants. At the games there was a mass gymnastic display by 10,000 persons and tens of athletes set national records in track-and-field, weightlifting and cycling events.
					
					 Since then, the DPRK people have conducted various sports contests and mass sports activities on Day of Physical Culture every year.
					
					 On Sunday, Day of Physical Culture for this year, colorful sports and amusement games took place at industrial establishments, farms and schools across the country.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Praises Kim Jong Il's Feats Performed in Party-Building
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Praises Kim Jong Il's Feats Performed in Party-Building
 Pyongyang, October 12 (KCNA) -- The Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) has remarkably grown strong to be an ideologically pure entity, integral organization which invariably preserves the revolutionary character as the party of the leader and firmly ensures the monolithic ideology and leadership thanks to the energetic ideological and theoretical activities and wise guidance of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Rodong Sinmun Sunday says this in an article.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 Leader's idea and leadership only should govern the party; this was the firm faith Kim Jong Il consistently maintained in the whole period of leading the WPK.
					
					 Thanks to his guidance the WPK regarded it as the basic principle governing the building of a party to ensure the monolithic ideology and leadership and firmly established the unitary ideological system and unitary leadership system throughout the party, thus developing it into invincible combat ranks moving as one under the guidance of the leader.
					
					 The WPK has steadily intensified the work for strengthening unity and cohesion, considering it as an important task for building the party under his leadership, thereby achieving steel-strong unity and cohesion despite storm and stress.
					
					 It has led the popular masses along the ever-victorious road for years by laying down the most scientific and revolutionary lines, policies, strategies and tactics.
					
					 It is now confidently stepping up the general advance for the final victory of the revolutionary cause of Juche under the Songun leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The revolutionary cause of the party is invincible as it established strong sense of organization and discipline in which all its members move as one and all party organizations including party cells are staunchly struggling as death-defying corps and a scout party in implementing party's policies under the unitary leadership of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: DPRK Papers Observe Anniversary of Opening of DPRK-Russia Diplomatic Relations
articles.content:
DPRK Papers Observe Anniversary of Opening of DPRK-Russia Diplomatic Relations 
 Pyongyang, October 12 (KCNA) -- DPRK papers Sunday dedicate articles to the 66th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic relations between the DPRK and Russia.
					 Rodong Sinmun says that the friendly relations between the DPRK and Russia have long and deep historical roots and tradition.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 Russia was the first to open diplomatic relations with the DPRK, the genuine people's country, which was founded by the Korean people after bringing down the Japanese imperialists' colonial rule and setting about building a new society.
					
					 This greatly encouraged the Korean people who had to explore the untrodden path of building a new country under the complicated situation where everything was in short supply after the liberation of Korea.
					
					 Since then the two countries have weathered all sorts of ordeals and storms while closely cooperating with each other in various fields including politics, economy and culture on the principle of independence, mutual respect, non-interference in other's affairs and equality.
					
					 The DPRK-Russia ties are becoming closer in all domains with great vitality.
					
					 The Russian Federation has increased its position and influence while preserving independence and achieving stable economic development even under the complicated international situation.
					
					 The Korean people sincerely hope that the efforts of the Russian people to achieve social stability and national unity and build a powerful state will yield good fruits.
					
					 Minju Joson stresses that the long-standing traditional DPRK-Russia friendship will grow stronger thanks to the common efforts of the two peoples.

articles.title: Papers Rap S. Korean Authorities for Conniving at Leaflet-scattering Operation
articles.content:
Papers Rap S. Korean Authorities for Conniving at Leaflet-scattering Operation
 Pyongyang, October 12 (KCNA) -- Human scum in south Korea finally carried out a leaflet-scattering operation against the DPRK despite its warnings.
					 Papers Sunday say that it was none other than the south Korean authorities who spearheaded the recent provocation to the DPRK.
					
					 The DPRK, expressing hope that the inter-Korean relations would not be driven again into an undesirable catastrophe, strongly urged the south Korean authorities to stop at once human scum from conducting the leaf-scattering operation aimed at defaming the dignity and social system of the DPRK, says Rodong Sinmun.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 Had the south Korean authorities truly hoped for the improved inter-Korean relations, they should have respected their dialogue partner and taken a step for checking the leaf-scattering operation against the DPRK. 
					
					 It is necessary to keep promise with faith and put it into practice, not talking only. 
					
					 As it happened in the past, the leaflet-scattering operation was conducted according to the anti-DPRK "human rights" scenario of the U.S. and the puppet group from A to Z.
					
					 How one can expect the improved inter-Korean relations and dialogue from those who are getting hell-bent on the reckless provocation to the dialogue partner, obsessed by daydream in utter disregard of the destiny of the nation.
					
					 The action of the puppet group not only pushed the inter-Korean relations into a catastrophe but put the scheduled second round of the north-south high-level contact in the danger of abortion.
					
					 The prevailing situation clearly proves that the anti-DPRK leaflet-scattering operation presented itself as an urgent issue of most seriously bedeviling the inter-Korean relations.
					
					 Minju Joson says that whether the inter-Korean relations will improve or not entirely hinges on the attitude of the south Korean authorities.

articles.title: Korean in Japan Calls for Fighting to Open Era of National Reunification
articles.content:
Korean in Japan Calls for Fighting to Open Era of National Reunification
 Tokyo, October 11 (KNS-KCNA) -- Ri Yong Su, chairman of the Korean Social Scientists Association in Japan, made public a statement on Oct. 8 on the occasion of the 34th anniversary of the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo (DFRK).
					 President Kim Il Sung advanced the DFRK proposal, the most just way of Korea's reunification, at the Sixth Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea on October 10, Juche 69 (1980), the statement said, and went on:
					
					 The proposal is a precious legacy left by him for the Korean nation as it is the most realistic way of reunification and a bright blueprint which indicated the way of building a reunified state.
					
					 The Korean nation could dynamically advance along the road of reunification thanks to the wise guidance of leader Kim Jong Il who most perfectly carried out the noble plan and intention of Kim Il Sung.
					
					 The reunification cause led by Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il is entering a new stage under the guidance of Marshal Kim Jong Un, another peerless great man of Mt. Paektu.
					
					 The Korean Social Scientists Association in Japan will hold Kim Jong Un as the lodestar of reunification in high esteem and devote all wisdom and energies to certainly opening the Korean nation's era of reunification in which the proposal for founding the DFRK is realized.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Work Introduced in Nigeria
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Work Introduced in Nigeria
 Pyongyang, October 12 (KCNA) -- The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism posted a detailed gist of "3. Let Us Reunify the Country Independently and Peacefully" of President Kim Il Sung's work "Report to the Sixth Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea on the Work of the Central Committee" on its website on Oct. 3.
					 The part of the work, published on October 10, Juche 69 (1980), referred to the struggle of the WPK for national reunification in the period under review and tasks for achieving the independent and peaceful reunification of the country. 
					
					 It indicates the new reunification proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo (DFRK) on the three principles of national reunification and the 10-point administrative policy to be carried out by the DFRK.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Introduced in Austria
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Introduced in Austria
 Pyongyang, October 12 (KCNA) -- The Society for the Promotion of the Relations between Austria and the DPRK posted supreme leader Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Brilliantly Accomplish the Revolutionary Cause of Juche, Holding Kim Jong Il in High Esteem as the Eternal General Secretary of Our Party" on its website on October 5.
					 The work, published on April 6, Juche 101 (2012), says that it is the principled requirement for victoriously advancing the cause of the Korean revolution to hold leader Kim Jong Il in high esteem as the eternal general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					
					 It also indicates the tasks to be fulfilled to steadily develop the WPK into the glorious President Kim Il Sung's and Kim Jong Il's party.

articles.title: WPK's Birthday Marked in Benin, Nigeria
articles.content:
WPK's Birthday Marked in Benin, Nigeria
 Pyongyang, October 12 (KCNA) -- A joint meeting took place in Benin and a photo exhibition and film show in Nigeria on Oct. 3 to mark the 69th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK). 
					 On display at the venue of the photo exhibition were photos documenting revolutionary exploits of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un and other photos showing the path of victory covered by the WPK. 
					
					 Films shown included Korean film "Monument to Party Founding". 
					
					 The chairman of the Benin-Korea Amicable Association "Long Live Kim Jong Il, Supreme Leader" said:
					
					 The WPK is demonstrating its might as an ever-victorious party. This is ascribable to the great guiding idea and unity and cohesion of the whole party. 
					
					 The Korean people call the WPK a mother party and absolutely trust and follow it. It is the truth of history that the party with such mass foundation is sure to win. 
					
					 A department director of the Ministry of Labor in Yobe State, Nigeria said that Kim Jong Il wisely led the WPK so that it might dynamically push forward the overall cause of socialism with the army as a driving force and mainstay of the revolution. 
					
					 An official of the Franoson Manyon International Company Ltd. of Nigeria and other speakers said that the WPK and the Korean people are putting spurs to the building of a highly civilized socialist nation under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: WPK's Birthday Observed by Thai Organization
articles.content:
WPK's Birthday Observed by Thai Organization
 Pyongyang, October 12 (KCNA) -- The Thailand-DPRK Friendship Association made public a statement on October 3 to mark the 69th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK). 
					 The statement said:
					
					 The WPK which organizes and guides all the victories of the Korean people was founded on October 10, 1945. 
					
					 Under the guidance of the WPK the Korean revolution has recorded an ever-victorious history, holding aloft the banner of the Juche idea, the Songun idea. 
					
					 Since its birth the WPK has put primary efforts to the army building and its development. 
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK beat back the U.S. armed invasion aimed to nip the less than two years old DPRK in the bud and honorably defended the freedom and independence of the country. This was entirely possible thanks to the party's leadership.
					
					 The WPK which defended socialism despite the worst adversity at the end of the last century is achieving world-startling successes day by day by arousing the Korean people. 
					
					 Victory and glory will always be in store for the Korean people invariably advancing along the road of independence, Songun and socialism under the wise leadership of the WPK.

articles.title: Korean Photo, Book and Handicraft Exhibitions Open in Russia, Mongolia, Mexico
articles.content:
Korean Photo, Book and Handicraft Exhibitions Open in Russia, Mongolia, Mexico
 Pyongyang, October 12 (KCNA) -- Korean photo, book and handcraft exhibitions opened in Russia, Mongolia and Mexico from October 1 to 6 to mark the 17th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's election as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and its 69th founding anniversary. 
					 Hanging on the front walls of the exhibition halls were portraits of smiling President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 On display at the venues of the events were photos on exploits performed by Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un in leading the party building and their Songun leadership exploits. 
					
					 Also displayed there were works of the peerless great men of Mt. Paektu, photos and books introducing Songun Korea and handicrafts associated with wisdom and talents of Koreans. 
					
					 The vice-mayor of Alexandrov City, Moscow Region, Russia said:
					
					 The WPK has covered only the ever-victorious road, meeting all challenges of history with the might of single-minded unity under the leadership of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 True to their behests Kim Jong Un is developing the WPK into the most militant party and the party for the people without an equal in the world. 
					
					 The DPRK is sure to emerge a thriving nation in the near future. 
					
					 The vice-minister of Culture, Sports and Tourism of Mongolia said Mongolia sets store by the friendly relations with the heroic Korean people led by the WPK and will invariably boost these relations under any circumstances. 
					
					 The chairman of a Mexican center said that the glorious history of the WPK will be given steady continuity in the future, too thanks to the wise leadership of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: DPRK's Proposal for Achieving Reunification by Federal Formula Supported
articles.content:
DPRK's Proposal for Achieving Reunification by Federal Formula Supported
 Pyongyang, October 12 (KCNA) -- Beninese and Austrian organizations released statements on the occasion of the 34th anniversary of the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo. 
					 The Benin-Korea Amicable Association "Long Live Kim Jong Il, Supreme Leader" and the Benin National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea said in a joint statement on October 3:
					
					 Kim Il Sung, eternal President of the DPRK, clarified the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo which indicates the most correct orientation and ways for Korea's reunification at the Sixth Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea on October 10, 1980. 
					
					 The federal formula serves as the most realistic proposal for fair and peaceful reunification in line with the will, wishes and interests of all Koreans.
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il, regarding it as a sacred duty of the nation to successfully carry out the President's cause of national reunification, ushered in the June 15 era of reunification, opening a rosy prospect for the reunification of the country. 
					
					 Marshal Kim Jong Un is remaining true to the last instructions of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il for national reunification. 
					
					 We reaffirm support for the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo. 
					
					 We extend full support and solidarity to the just cause of the Korean people for national reunification by federal formula under the leadership of Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 The Solidarity Committee of Unionists for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea in Austria released a statement on October 5 urging the south Korean authorities to come out to the negotiating table for the peaceful reunification of Korea.
